patch.description:
**Deactivates Member by Code - Admin only**
- **Member_Code**: code of the member to be deactivated.
- **Church_Code**: code of the church of the member to be deactivated.
- **Exit_Date**: effective date of exit (deactivation) of the member.
- **Exit_Reason**: type of exit of the member.
- **Exit_Note**: note of exit of the member.
